name: Resonance (itch) (subtree)
description:
Resonance is a casual puzzle game that is fun to play. Train your brain and make it sharper. This game is addictive as well as challenging.

In this game, you will be given initial amount of energy. Your every move will cost you energy which is the number written on the cell. Goal of the game is to reach the end point before your energy goes below zero. There are many ways in which you can reach the end point but there is only one way in which you can reach the endpoint with the given amount of energy.

The game starts with 3 by 3 grid and goes till 15 by 15 grid. There are 500 levels. Each level is more difficult than the previous level.

You just have to use mouse to play this game. If you like this game feel free to check out my first 3D game - Anti Gravity Race. Link: https://subtree.itch.io/anti-gravity-race
